species.name: Amur Leopard
species.info: The Amur leopard is a critically endangered subspecies of leopard native to the Russian Far East and northeastern China.

species.name: Javan Rhinoceros
species.info: The Javan rhinoceros is a critically endangered species of rhinoceros endemic to the Indonesian island of Java.

species.name: Sumatran Tiger
species.info: The Sumatran tiger is a critically endangered population of the Panthera tigris subspecies native to the Indonesian island of Sumatra.

species.name: Golden Poison Frog
species.info: The golden poison frog is a poison dart frog endemic to the Pacific coast of Colombia and is considered one of the most poisonous animals on Earth.

species.name: Panamanian Golden Frog
species.info: The Panamanian golden frog is a critically endangered species of toad endemic to Panama, known for its unique appearance and waving behavior.
